RouterHosting has start to selling great Windows and Linux Virtual private servers with %50 off on our new node servers for lifetime.
All nodes are equipped with 2 x Quad Core CPUs, 16-32GB DDR3 RAM and RAID10 arrays.


What's include with all our service plans:
- Powered by Virtuozzo 4.5
- Instant OS reloads and reboots from within Virtuozzo Power Panel.
- Semi-Managed support - We try our best to help where we can
- 15-days money back guarantee
- 1Gbps connection
- Easy&Fast UPGRADES - on the fly upgrades
